name: Jorge Pérez 0001
content: Jorge Pérez Jorge Pérez Associate Professor Department of Computer Science Universidad de Chile Selected Publications (for a full list see Google scholar page or DBLP) Model Interpretability through the Lens of Computational Complexity Pablo Barceló, Mikael Monet, Jorge Pérez, Bernardo Subercaseaux NeurIPS 2020 The Logical Expressiveness of Graph Neural Networks Pablo Barceló, Egor V. Kostylev, Mikael Monet, Jorge Pérez, Juan Reutter and Juan-Pablo Silva ICLR 2020 (talk, slides, poster) WEFE: The Word Embeddings Fairness Evaluation Framework Pablo Badilla, Felipe Bravo-Marquez, Jorge Pérez IJCAI 2020 Spanish Pre-Trained BERT Model and Evaluation Data Jose Cañete, Gabriel Chaperon, Rodrigo Fuentes, Jou-Hui Ho, Hojin Kang and Jorge Pérez PML4DC @ ICLR 2020 (talk, slides, code) Predicting Unplanned Readmissions with Highly Unstructured Data Constanza Fierro, Jorge Pérez, and Javier Mora AI4AH @ ICLR 2020 On the Turing Completeness of Modern Neural Network Architectures Jorge Pérez, Javier Marinković and Pablo Barceló ICLR 2019 (poster) Expressiveness of Matrix and Tensor Query Languages in terms of ML Operators Pablo Barceló, Nelson Higuera, Jorge Pérez, Bernardo Subercaseaux DEEM @ SIGMOD 2019 (slides) Hate Speech Detection is Not as Easy as You May Think: A Closer Look at Model Validation Aymé Arango, Jorge Pérez, Barbara Poblete SIGIR 2019 (slides) Semantics and Complexity of GraphQL Olaf Hartig and Jorge Pérez WWW 2018 (slides) A Model of Distributed Query Computation in Client-Server Scenarios on the Semantic Web Olaf Hartig, Ian Letter and Jorge Pérez IJCAI 2018 200K+ Crowdsourced Political Arguments for a New Chilean Constitution Constanza Fierro, Claudio Fuentes-Bravo, Jorge Pérez and Mauricio Quezada ArgMining @ EMNLP 2017 (slides) A Formal Framework for Comparing Linked Data Fragments Olaf Hartig, Ian Letter and Jorge Pérez Best Paper Award ISWC 2017 (slides) Counting beyond a Yottabyte, or how SPARQL 1.1 Property Paths will prevent adoption of the standard Marcelo Arenas, Sebastián Conca and Jorge Pérez Best Paper Award WWW 2012 (slides) Data Exchange beyond Complete Data Marcelo Arenas, Jorge Pérez, and Juan L. Reutter Best Paper Award PODS 2011 (slides) Semantics and Complexity of SPARQL Jorge Pérez, Marcelo Arenas, and Claudio Gutierrez Best Paper Award ISWC 2006 (slides) Twitter: @perez Github: jorgeperezrojas
